title: Learner-Centered Multiple Intelligences-Based Project Design Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Basic social studies knowledge and professional competencies
context.additional_context: Performing field-oriented social problem-solving projects using smartphone-based collaborative tools.

learning_goals: Learners can create learner-customized PBL (Project-Based Learning) activity design documents by applying multiple intelligence theory
Learners can propose strategies to improve engagement in social problem-solving projects by over 80% through peer feedback.
Learners can manage collaborative projects using smartphone apps (e.g., Google Docs, Padlet) in resource-constrained technical environments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
